bio: Nathaniel Wilkens is a Technical Artist based in Cincinnati, working in live entertainment, broadcast, and immersive installations. His practice centers on real-time systems integration, technical direction, and media server programming. With a background in Opera and Interactive Media Studies from Miami University, he brings a multidisciplinary perspective to technical production. He has spent recent years working across Los Angeles and internationally, recently serving as Technical Director for a large scale projection at BLINK 2024 as well as lead Stage Precision programmer at the Esports World Cup.

pressAndAwards.title: Hydrogen Jukebox, American Prize - Virtual Performance
